column3:
ウオトリー村は漁師の村

漁師サバッキャは悩んでいた
屈指の好漁場 アライソ海岸に
魔物たちが拠点を作って占拠してしまったらしい

魔物を退治してサバッキャを安心させよう
column4:
Lurelin Village is a fishing village, but the
residents have been distressed lately. The
fisherman Sebasto in particular is in a bind
because a group ofmonstershave built an
encampment right on Aris Beach—the best
fishing spot for miles around.

Defeat the monsters on the beach so the village
can resume its regular fishing.

column3:
アライソ海岸に拠点をかまえる
魔物たちを すべて退治した！

サバッキャに報告しよう
column4:
You defeated all the monsters occupying the
encampment on Aris Beach!

Go tell Sebasto the good news.

column3:
アライソ海岸に拠点をかまえていた
魔物たちがいなくなり
屈指の好漁場が復活したようだ
column4:
The monsters that once occupied the
encampment on Aris Beach have been
dispatched, and the village's regular
fishing operations have resumed.
